# Mission History

> Persistent memory of completed missions — what was requested, what was done, and the outcome.
> **You can edit this file directly** — add notes, correct outcomes, or annotate mission results.
> The Orchestrator will append a summary here after every mission completes.

---

## [YYYY-MM-DD] mission-id
- **Request**: what the user asked for
- **Outcome**: success / partial / failed
- **Files changed**: list of files created/modified
- **Key learnings**: what was discovered during this mission
- **Duration**: rough effort estimate
- **Follow-ups**: any remaining work or recommendations
-->
